execution_plan.description: Aggregate total revenue per customer in the EU database
execution_plan.query: SELECT customers.email AS s1__email, customers.full_name AS s1__full_name, SUM(orders.total_eur) AS s1__total_eur FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customers.email, customers.full_name;

execution_plan.description: Aggregate total revenue per customer in the US database
execution_plan.query: SELECT customers.email AS s2__email, customers.full_name AS s2__full_name, SUM(orders.total_eur) AS s2__total_eur FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customers.email, customers.full_name;

execution_plan.description: Combine EU and US per-customer totals (matching by email), sum global revenue, and return top 10 customers
execution_plan.query: SELECT combined.email AS s3__email, combined.full_name AS s3__full_name, SUM(combined.total_eur) AS s3__total_eur FROM ( SELECT $step1.s1__email AS email, $step1.s1__full_name AS full_name, $step1.s1__total_eur AS total_eur UNION ALL SELECT $step2.s2__email AS email, $step2.s2__full_name AS full_name, $step2.s2__total_eur AS total_eur ) AS combined GROUP BY combined.email, combined.full_name ORDER BY s3__total_eur DESC LIMIT 10;
